attributes.additional_details:
Vivisection is deadly to animals and harmful and detrimental to human health and wellbeing. Vivisection results are useless and cause more harm than good.

We want complete ban on this barbaric archaic crime.

To find out more about the campaign and about vivisection, or to comment on this issue please visit:

www.CardiffAR.co.uk

Bring an end to the horrific torture and unnecessary suffering of animals.
